channel.title: The Goon
channel.description:
It all started just looking for random movie news... then I see David Fincher's name pop up. Intrigued, I click on it. It was news that he is to produce a CG animated film based on Cult classic comic series, The Goon. I was like "huh, I've heard of this before", and that was that. Then out of nowhere I actually see the proof of concept animation for the film.
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3axeIVXrCbU&feature=related[/url]
Holy fuck, man. I had to catch myself up with this series. Just finished volume 1. Didn't regret it. It's fucking awesome. Now I'm all psyched for a movie I'm not even sure has been greenlit yet(edit: It has).
Fuck.
Also, I recommend the books to anyone who would be interested in Rated R sam & max with some Sin City elements thrown in.

item.title: The Goon
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
It all started just looking for random movie news… then I see David Fincher’s name pop up. Intrigued, I click on it. It was news that he is to produce a CG animated film based on Cult classic comic series, The Goon. I was like “huh, I’ve heard of this before”, and that was that. Then out of nowhere I actually see the proof of concept animation for the film.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3axeIVXrCbU&feature=related

Holy fuck, man. I had to catch myself up with this series. Just finished volume 1. Didn’t regret it. It’s fucking awesome. Now I’m all psyched for a movie I’m not even sure has been greenlit yet(edit: It has).

Fuck.

Also, I recommend the books to anyone who would be interested in Rated R sam & max with some Sin City elements thrown in.
